remarks: Membership in a set of open intervals of extended reals.  We use the fact that an operation's value is empty outside of its domain to show ` A e. RR* ` and ` B e. RR* ` .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
statement: elioo3g $p |- ( C e. ( A (,) B ) <-> ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ C e. RR* ) /\ ( A < C /\ C < B ) ) ) $.
